title: Stories from Gippsland : Digital Storytelling project
creator_credit: Lyn Skillern, Bridget Nicholson, Zephlyn Neilsen, Shirlee McPherson, Lyn Johnson, Graham Goulding, Vivianne Everett, Ruth Burleigh, Rowena Ashley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Nine members of the Gippsland community tell of the things dearest to them : whether they be close friends, life changing experiences, treasured animals or inspirational family members. These things and people have all served the participants in providing them with a sense of home.
creator_credit_for_label: Lyn Skillern, Bridget Nicholson, Zephlyn Neilsen, Shirlee McPherson, Lyn Johnson, Graham Goulding, Vivianne Everett, Ruth Burleigh, Rowena Ashley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
